specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit when fighting in melee.
specialRules.name: Battle Lore
specialRules.label: Battle Lore
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit when fighting in melee.

specialRules.hint: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit when shooting.
specialRules.name: Guild Defender
specialRules.label: Guild Defender
specialRules.description: The hero and all friendly units within 12" get +1 to hit when shooting.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2" of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2" of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.label: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.
specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.label: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.
specialRules.name: Swift
specialRules.label: Swift
specialRules.description: The hero may ignore the Slow rule.

spells.name: Spite Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" gets -1 to hit in melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Smiting Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Battle Rune
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +6" next time it moves.

spells.name: Breaking Rune
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12" takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Drill Rune
spells.effect: Target piece of terrain within 6" may be moved by up to 6" in any direction or may be removed from play.

spells.name: Cleaving Rune
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12" take 6 automatic hits each.
